attributes.action: lower the legal sex age to 15
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: more teenagers are having sex younger.they are not going to stop because of the law.So why not lower the age limit to 15. 15 yearolds know what they are doing and their mind is more developed.The female body can handle pregnancy if it happens and are also in comtrol of their emotions.If we give them some rein things may look up
